content: I added a linkifier for #queue4, for ready-for-review PRs for mathlib4. (Some of the filters, e.g. awaiting-CI, are currently irrelevant, but seem harmless and hopefully useful eventually.)
My browser claims bit.ly doesn't exist... :thinking:
Hmmm, #queue also uses a shortcut there. Does that still work for you?
Hmm, it's a browser issue. It works in a different browser.

There are 3 PRs on the queue that are "old". The are about CSy data or about tactics. So I don't feel comfy reviewing them. Can someone else take a look at them? @Mario Carneiro @Gabriel Ebner @Scott Morrison

• feat: port Data.Vector from lean-core mathlib4#834
  • feat: port Data.Stream.Init mathlib4#849
  • feat: refactor of solve_by_elim mathlib4#856
since David and I are happy with mathlib4#856 and nobody is complaining, it is probably good to be merged
Anyone has time for these (2 of the 3 are mine)?
There's a whole bunch of non-porting PRs at the top of the queue (positivity extensions, and other tacticy stuff). Could some meta heroes please take a look at those?
